page.title: 03AFTER SCHOOL IN SHAWHEAD
page.content:
Our school is used for many things after school such as Guides. The Guides meet on a Tuesday night from 6.30 to 8.00pm. There are 7 Guides and 2 Guiders. Sometimes if it is a nice night they go out into the playground or playing field. The Brownies meet in the school as well. There are 14 Brownies and 2 Guiders and 1 Ranger helper. They meet on a Monday night from 6.00 to 7.00pm.
There is a Computer Club on a Tuesday from 8.00 to 9.30pm. About 10 people go to the Computer Club.
There is a concert at the end of term. There are also parents' meetings and coffee evenings. Community Council meetings are on the third Tuesday of every month. The school is used as a Polling Station at Election time.
